.. role:: hidden
    :class: hidden-section

qpytorch.kernels.keops
===================================

.. automodule:: qpytorch.kernels.keops
.. currentmodule:: qpytorch.kernels.keops


These kernels are compatible with the QPyTorch KeOps integration.
All of them are ported from GPyTorch.

.. note::
   Only some standard kernels have KeOps implementations.


.. _KeOps Tutorial:
   examples/02_Scalable_Exact_GPs/KeOps_GP_Regression.html
